name: Shadow Ooze
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ooze makes one pseudopod attack and then uses Snuff Out.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage and 3 (1d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Snuff Out
actions.desc: The ooze extinguishes one natural or magical light source within 60 feet of it. If the light source is created by a spell, it is dispelled.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Aura of Darkness
special_abilities.desc: The ooze devours all natural and magical light within 30 feet of it. This area is heavily obscured by darkness for all creatures except shadow fey.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
